title: Seafood Noodle Bowl
ingredients: ['700ml fish or chicken stock, made with stock cubes', '1 bunch of spring onions, chopped', '2cm piece of fresh root ginger, peeled and grated', '1 lemongrass stalk, finely chopped (optional)', '2 tsp soy sauce', '225g white fish fillet, such as haddock or pollock, cut into 2cm chunks', '125g queen scallops, cut into bite-sized pieces', '175g cooked, peeled prawns', '200g pak choi, thinly sliced', '2 x 150g sachets straight-to-wok medium noodles']
